mods.abstract: Temple of Sobek and Heroeris at Kom Ombo (Ptolemaic Period); main Temple constructed of sandstone dedicated to two triads of deities before cleared of debris by Jacques de Morgan in 1893 (foreground); "Zangaki No. 784 Kom Ombo Temple de Sebek et Horus..." in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
